text: Ðis sind þa landgemære ðara X hida.
Ærest of coppan wyllan broc þonne ða blacana wyllan<../images/tbar.gif>of blacan wyllan on ðone heafod æcer of þan æcere andlang gemæres on heslburh midde wearde.
Of hæselbyrg on hæsl ford andlang streames on þone ealdan ford.
Of þan forde a be gemære<../images/tbar.gif>on ða stræt of þære stræt on þone læg acer.
Of þan læg æcere a be mære<../images/tbar.gif>on þone hrigc weg.
Of þan hric wege be gemære<../images/tbar.gif>on þa ealdan dic andlang dices onlang dices brigce.
Of þære brigce ongean stream<../images/tbar.gif>on gres wyllan broc of þam broce on fule wyllan of þam wylle be gemære on scearpannesse a be gemære<../images/tbar.gif>on ðone steort.
Of þan steorte on ða stræt andlang streate on hun burhge leah of þære leahe<../images/tbar.gif>eft on eoppan wyllan broc.
